search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for PDF4me (pdf4me.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for PDF4me can be found here: [https://pdf4me.com/help/faqs/](https://pdf4me.com/help/faqs/)【3:0†source】.

PDF4me FAQs - Subscriptions
===============

[](https://pdf4me.com/ "PDF4me logo")

[![Image 1: Make, Power Automate, Zapier and Pdf4me Automation](https://pdf4me.com/images/automation/automationLogo.svg)DevelopersAre you looking for automation ?](https://dev.pdf4me.com/)

|

[Pricing](https://pdf4me.com/pricing/)

|

[Login](https://pdf4me.com/p4m/account/login/en?returnUrl=/dashboard/)

Pricing & Subscription
======================

Clear your doubts about PDF4me Pricing and Subscriptions
--------------------------------------------------------

*   [Help](https://pdf4me.com/help/)
*   Pricing & Subscription

### How can I change my payment method?

You can change your Payment method from the payment section on your Account page. You can add additional payment methods as a backup.

[Read More](https://pdf4me.com/help/subscription/change-payment-method/)

### What kind of payment methods do you support?

You would be required to add a payment method for starting a PDF4me free trial. PDF4me accepts all International Debit or Credit cards(except American Express and JCB). Also, you can use your PayPal account to start a Free Trial with us.

[Read More](https://pdf4me.com/help/subscription/supported-payment-methods/)

### How can I cancel my subscription?

You can access all your account-related information on your PDF4me Account page. You can Cancel or Re-activate your Subscription from your Account page itself.

[Read More](https://pdf4me.com/help/subscription/cancel-subscription/)

### Is there any expiry date to redeem the points?

There is no expiry date for redeeming the points.

[Read More](https://pdf4me.com/help/account/loyalty-points-expiry/)

### Where do I check my loyalty points history and balance ?

The history of the points earned for every transaction and the available balances can be viewed in the rewards redemption history page. <<Redemption history\>\>

[Read More](https://pdf4me.com/help/account/loyalty-points-rewards-history/)

### Why OCR not available in Basic Plan?

We implement a high-end OCR engine and is one of the premium features in the PDF4me Suite. Access to OCR is available only to the Pro users.

[Read More](https://pdf4me.com/help/subscription/ocr-not-available-in-basic-plan/)

Your feedback counts

PDF4me is a constantly evolving document management tool. Our mission is to discover the best ways to improve PDF4me and add new features to help our consumers. We would love to collaborate with you all in this mission.

[Help us to improve PDF4me](https://pdf4me.com/improve-pdf4me/)
